feed.title: GitHub Objective-C Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Objective-C in GitHub

entry.title: PromiseKit/AVFoundation
entry.summary:
PromiseKit AVFoundation Extensions

This project adds promises to Appleâ€™s AVFoundation framework.

CococaPods

pod "PromiseKit/AVFoundation" ~> 6.0

The extensions are built into PromiseKit.framework thus nothing else is needed.

Carthage

github "PromiseKit/AVFoundation" ~> 3.0

The extensions are built into their own framework:

// swift
import PromiseKit
import PMKAVFoundation

// objc
@import PromiseKit;
@import PMKAVFoundation;
